description: Welcome to Prompt Reviews! This comprehensive guide will help you set up your account and start collecting customer reviews in under 30 minutes.

key_features.title: Quick Setup Process
key_features.description: Get your account set up and collecting reviews in under 30 minutes with our streamlined onboarding process.

key_features.title: Business Profile Configuration
key_features.description: Complete your business information to unlock all features and personalize your review requests.

key_features.title: First Prompt Page Creation
key_features.description: Create your first personalized review request page with AI-powered content generation.

key_features.title: Contact Management Setup
key_features.description: Import your existing customer database or manually add contacts to start requesting reviews.

key_features.title: Review Collection Launch
key_features.description: Send your first review requests and start collecting authentic customer feedback immediately.

key_features.title: Website Integration
key_features.description: Embed review widgets on your website to showcase positive reviews and build trust.

how_it_works.title: Create Your Account
how_it_works.description: Sign up for Prompt Reviews and complete your business profile information including name, address, and contact details.

how_it_works.title: Choose Your Plan
how_it_works.description: Select the subscription plan that best fits your business needs and review collection goals.

how_it_works.title: Build Your First Prompt Page
how_it_works.description: Create a personalized review request page using our AI-powered content generation tools.

how_it_works.title: Add Contacts & Start Collecting
how_it_works.description: Import your customers and send your first review requests via email, SMS, or QR codes.

best_practices.title: Start with Recent Customers
best_practices.description: Focus on customers who recently had positive experiences. They're more likely to leave glowing reviews and remember details clearly.

best_practices.title: Use AI Content Generation
best_practices.description: Take advantage of AI-powered content creation to personalize your review requests and improve response rates.

best_practices.title: Test Different Approaches
best_practices.description: Try various prompt page types and messaging strategies to see what works best for your business and customers.

best_practices.title: Keep It Simple
best_practices.description: Make the review process as easy as possible. The fewer clicks and steps required, the more reviews you'll collect.
